definitions.definition: Happiness ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
An apt and pleasing style in speech , writing , etc.; ( countable ) an apt and pleasing choice of words .
Good luck ; success ; ( countable ) An instance of unexpected good luck; a stroke of luck ; also, a lucky characteristic .
Reproduction of a sign with fidelity .
examples: The quotation was rendered with felicity .

definitions.definition: Something that is either a source of happiness or particularly apt .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Happiness ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) An apt and pleasing style in speech , writing , etc.; ( countable ) an apt and pleasing choice of words .
( uncountable , rare ) Good luck ; success ; ( countable ) An instance of unexpected good luck; a stroke of luck ; also, a lucky characteristic .
( uncountable , semiotics ) Reproduction of a sign with fidelity .
( countable ) Something that is either a source of happiness or particularly apt .
( uncountable , economics ) Period (as opposed to lifetime) utility .
